mapper.insert: insert into store_list(store_address, store_name, store_phone, store_delivery, store_driverthru, store_status, store_code, store_log, store_lat) values(#{store_address}, #{store_name}, #{store_phone}, #{store_delivery}, #{store_driverthru}, #{store_status}, #{store_code}, #{store_log}, #{store_lat})
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM (SELECT row_number() over(ORDER BY s.store_code ASC)rnum, s.* FROM store_list s WHERE 1=1 AND s.store_name like CONCAT('%',#{search},'%')
ORDER BY rnum ASC ) list where rnum>(#{pageNum}-1)*#{amount} and rnum<= #{pageNum} * #{amount}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_info(user_email, user_password, user_name, user_gender, user_status, user_phone, oauth, role, user_regdate, store_code) VALUES(#{user_email}, #{user_password}, #{user_name}, #{user_gender}, 1, #{user_phone}, 'edonald', 'ROLE_SADMIN', sysdate(), #{store_code})
mapper.select: SELECT user_email FROM user_info WHERE user_email = #{user_email}
